2-7 å®Œå–„ spider

å®Œå–„ spider å³é€šè¿‡æ–¹æ³•è¿›è¡Œæ•°æ®çš„æå–ç­‰æ“ä½œ

import scrapy

 # è‡ªå®šä¹‰spiderç±»ï¼Œç»§æ‰¿scrapy.spider
 class DuanziSpider(scrapy.Spider):
     # çˆ¬è™«åå­—
     name = 'duanzi'
     # å…è®¸çˆ¬å–çš„èŒƒå›´ï¼Œé˜²æ­¢çˆ¬è™«çˆ¬åˆ°åˆ«çš„ç½‘ç«™
     allowed_domains = ['duanzixing.com']
     # å¼€å§‹çˆ¬å–çš„urlåœ°å€
     start_urls = ['http://duanzixing.com/']

     # æ•°æ®æå–çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼Œæ¥å—ä¸‹è½½ä¸­é—´ä»¶ä¼ è¿‡æ¥çš„response æ˜¯é‡å†™çˆ¶ç±»ä¸­çš„parseæ–¹æ³•
     def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
         # æ‰“å°æŠ“å–åˆ°çš„é¡µé¢æºç 
         # print(response.text)
         # xpathåŒ¹é…æ¯æ¡æ®µå­çš„articleåˆ—è¡¨
         article_list = response.xpath('//article[@class="excerpt"]')
         # print(article_list)
         # å¾ªç¯è·å–æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªarticle
         for article in article_list:
             # åŒ¹é…æ ‡é¢˜
             # title = article.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()')
             # [<Selector xpath='./header/h2/a/text()' data='ä¸€ä¸ªä¸å°å¿ƒå°±æŠŠ2000å—é’±çš„åŒ…åŒ…è®¾ç½®æˆäº†50åŒ…é‚®'>]
             # title = article.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()')[0].extract()
             # ç­‰åŒäº
             title = article.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()').extract_first()

             # è·å–æ®µå­å†…å®¹
             con = article.xpath('./p[@class="note"]/text()').extract_first()
             print('title', title)
             print('con', con)

3ï¼Œrespone å¯¹è±¡å¸¸ç”¨å±æ€§

- response.urlï¼š# å½“å‰å“åº”çš„urlåœ°å€
- response.request.urlï¼š## å½“å‰å“åº”å¯¹åº”çš„è¯·æ±‚çš„urlåœ°å€
- response.headersï¼š## å“åº”å¤´
- response.request.headersï¼š## å½“å‰å“åº”çš„è¯·æ±‚å¤´
- response.bodyï¼š## å“åº”ä½“ï¼Œä¹Ÿå°±æ˜¯htmlä»£ç ï¼Œbyteç±»å‹
- response.text  ## è¿”å›å“åº”çš„å†…å®¹ å­—ç¬¦ä¸²
- response.statusï¼š## å“åº”çŠ¶æ€ç 
- response.json()    ## æŠ“å–jsonæ•°æ®
import scrapy


class DzSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'dz'   # çˆ¬è™«çš„åå­—
    allowed_domains = ['duanzixing.com']  # å…è®¸çˆ¬å–çš„åŸŸåèŒƒå›´
    start_urls = ['http://duanzixing.com/']  # èµ·å§‹ç½‘å€

    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        print(response)
        print(response.url, 'å“åº”çš„URL')
        print(response.request.url, 'å“åº”å¯¹åº”è¯·æ±‚çš„URL')
        print(response.request.headers, 'å“åº”å¯¹åº”è¯·æ±‚çš„è¯·æ±‚å¤´')
        print(response.status, 'å“åº”çŠ¶æ€ç ')
        print(response.body, 'è¿”å›bytes å­—èŠ‚')
        print(response.text, 'è¿”å›å­—ç¬¦ä¸²')
        ## å¦‚æœè¿”å›çš„ä¸æ˜¯JSONæ•°æ®ï¼Œç”¨è¿™ä¸ªå±æ€§ä¼šæŠ¥é”™
        print(response.json(), 'è¿”å›JSONæ•°æ®')

æ³¨æ„ï¼š

import scrapy


class AiniSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'aini' # å½“å‰çˆ¬è™«çš„åå­—
    allowed_domains = ['duanzixing.com'] # å…è®¸çˆ¬å–åŸŸåçš„èŒƒå›´
    start_urls = ['http://duanzixing.com/'] # èµ·å§‹çˆ¬å–çš„URLåœ°å€ï¼Œå¯ä»¥æ”¹çš„

## è‡ªå·±æ‰‹åŠ¨è¡¥ä¸€ä¸‹ **kwargs
    def parse(self, response,**kwargs):
        ## å¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨xpathè¯­æ³•
        article_list = response.xpath('//article[@class="excerpt"]')
        for a in article_list:
            title1 = a.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()')
            # print(title) æ‰“å°å‘ç°è¿˜æ˜¯selectorå¯¹è±¡ï¼Œ
            # [<Selector xpath='./header/h2/a/text()' data='ä½ ä»¬å‘æœ‹å‹åœˆæˆ‘ä¹Ÿå‘'>]
            # éœ€è¦ç”¨åˆ°response.xpath å¯¹è±¡çš„ä¸€ä¸ªextractæ–¹æ³•æ‹¿åˆ°å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„å†…å®¹,è¿”å›çš„æ˜¯åˆ—è¡¨
            title2 = a.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()').extract()

            # ä½†æ˜¯é‡Œé¢å°±ä¸€ä¸ªå†…å®¹ï¼Œæ‰€ä»¥å¯ä»¥ç”¨extract_first()
            title3 = a.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()').extract()[0]  ## è·Ÿä¸‹é¢çš„æ•ˆæœä¸€æ ·
            title4 = a.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()').extract_first()
            print(title4)  ## ä½ ä»¬å‘æœ‹å‹åœˆæˆ‘ä¹Ÿå‘

  1. response.xpath æ–¹æ³•çš„è¿”å›ç»“æœæ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªç±»ä¼¼ list çš„ç±»å‹ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åŒ…å«çš„æ˜¯ selector å¯¹è±¡ï¼Œæ“ä½œå’Œåˆ—è¡¨ä¸€æ ·ï¼Œä½†æ˜¯æœ‰ä¸€äº›é¢å¤–çš„æ–¹æ³•

  2. extract() è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªåŒ…å«æœ‰å­—ç¬¦ä¸²çš„åˆ—è¡¨

    å¦‚æœä½¿ç”¨åˆ—è¡¨è°ƒç”¨ extract()åˆ™è¡¨ç¤ºï¼Œextract ä¼šå°†åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­æ¯ä¸€ä¸ªåˆ—è¡¨å…ƒç´ è¿›è¡Œ extract æ“ä½œï¼Œè¿”å›åˆ—è¡¨

  3. extract_first() è¿”å›åˆ—è¡¨ä¸­çš„ç¬¬ä¸€ä¸ªå­—ç¬¦ä¸²ï¼Œåˆ—è¡¨ä¸ºç©ºæ²¡æœ‰è¿”å› None

  4. spider ä¸­çš„ parse æ–¹æ³•å¿…é¡»æœ‰

  5. éœ€è¦æŠ“å–çš„ url åœ°å€å¿…é¡»å±äº allowed_domains,ä½†æ˜¯ start_urls ä¸­çš„ url åœ°å€æ²¡æœ‰è¿™ä¸ªé™åˆ¶

  6. å¯åŠ¨çˆ¬è™«çš„æ—¶å€™æ³¨æ„å¯åŠ¨çš„ä½ç½®ï¼Œæ˜¯åœ¨é¡¹ç›®è·¯å¾„ä¸‹å¯åŠ¨

4ï¼Œscrapy æ·±å…¥ä½¿ç”¨

- response.xpath()ï¼š ## ç›´æ¥æµ‹è¯•xpathè§„åˆ™æ˜¯å¦æ­£ç¡®

4-3 scrapy ç®¡é“

import scrapy


class DzSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'dz'
    # allowed_domains = ['duanzixing.com']
    start_urls = ['http://duanzixing.com/']

    def parse(self, response,**kwargs):
        article_list = response.xpath('//article[@class="excerpt"]')
        for article in article_list:
            title = article.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()').extract_first()
            con = article.xpath('./p[@class="note"]//text()').extract_first()
            data = {'title':title,'con':con}

            ## æŠŠæ•°æ®ä¼ ç»™ç®¡é“
            yield data

ç»ˆç«¯å‘½ä»¤

åªèƒ½å­˜å‚¨ csv æ ¼å¼ï¼Œè€Œä¸”æ•°æ®ä¼ ç»™ç®¡é“ä»¥åæ‰å¯ä»¥ç”¨è¿™ä¸ªå‘½ä»¤

## scrapy crawl çˆ¬è™«åç§° -o æ–‡ä»¶å.csv
scrapy crawl ITSpider -o ITSpider.csv

## å°†æ–‡ä»¶å­˜å‚¨åˆ°ITSpider.csv  æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­

æ€è€ƒï¼šä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆè¦ä½¿ç”¨ yieldï¼Ÿ

  1. è®©æ•´ä¸ªå‡½æ•°å˜æˆä¸€ä¸ªç”Ÿæˆå™¨ï¼Œæœ‰ä»€ä¹ˆå¥½å¤„å‘¢ï¼Ÿ
  2. éå†è¿™ä¸ªå‡½æ•°çš„è¿”å›å€¼çš„æ—¶å€™ï¼ŒæŒ¨ä¸ªæŠŠæ•°æ®è¯»åˆ°å†…å­˜ï¼Œä¸ä¼šé€ æˆå†…å­˜çš„ç¬é—´å ç”¨è¿‡é«˜
  3. python3 ä¸­çš„ range å’Œ python2 ä¸­çš„ xrange åŒç†

æ³¨æ„ï¼šyield èƒ½å¤Ÿä¼ é€’çš„å¯¹è±¡åªèƒ½æ˜¯ï¼šBaseItem,Request,dict,None

4-2 å¼€å¯ç®¡é“

   'doubanfile.pipelines.DoubanfilePipeline': 300,

pipeline ä¸­å¸¸ç”¨çš„æ–¹æ³•ï¼š

1. process_item(self,item,spider): ## å®ç°å¯¹itemæ•°æ®çš„å¤„ç†
2. open_spider(self, spider):  ## åœ¨çˆ¬è™«å¼€å¯çš„æ—¶å€™ä»…æ‰§è¡Œä¸€æ¬¡

class DuanziPipeline:
    ## å¼€å¯çš„æ—¶å€™èµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def open_spider(self,spider):
        pass

    # æ¯æ¬¡yieldçš„æ•°æ®è¿‡æ¥èµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        return item

    # scrapyä¹‹å¿ƒå®Œèµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def close_spider(self,spider):
        pass

4-3 æŠŠæ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨åœ¨æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­

import scrapy


class DzSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'dz'
    # allowed_domains = ['duanzixing.com']
    start_urls = ['http://duanzixing.com/']

    def parse(self, response,**kwargs):
        article_list = response.xpath('//article[@class="excerpt"]')
        for article in article_list:
            title = article.xpath('./header/h2/a/text()').extract_first()
            con = article.xpath('./p[@class="note"]//text()').extract_first()
            data = {'title':title,'con':con}

            ## æŠŠæ•°æ®ä¼ ç»™ç®¡é“
            yield data

ç®¡é“ä¸­è¿æ¥æ•°æ®åº“è¿›è¡Œå­˜å‚¨

from itemadapter import ItemAdapter

import pymysql

class DuanziPipeline:
    ## å¼€å¯çš„æ—¶å€™èµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def open_spider(self,spider):
        # è¿æ¥MySQLæ•°æ®åº“
        self.db = pymysql.connect(host='127.0.0.1', user='root', password='aini5726', db='duanzi',port=3306)

        # è®¾ç½®å­—ç¬¦é›†  é˜²æ­¢ä¹±ç 
        self.db.set_charset('utf8')

        # åˆ›å»ºæ¸¸æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
        self.cursor = self.db.cursor()

    # æ¯æ¬¡yieldçš„æ•°æ®è¿‡æ¥èµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        ##  itemæ˜¯ä¼ é€’è¿‡æ¥çš„æ•°æ®
        ## æŠŠæ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“ä¸­
        title = item['title']
        con = item['con']
        try:
            sql = f'insert into dz set title = "{title}",con = "{con}"'
            self.cursor.execute(sql)
            self.db.commit()
        except Exception as e:
            print(sql,'===>',e)
            self.db.rollback()
        return item

    # scrapyä¹‹å¿ƒå®Œèµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def close_spider(self,spider):
        ## å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        self.db.close()

4-4 æŠŠæ–‡ä»¶å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­

from itemadapter import ItemAdapter

class Duanzi01Pipeline:
    def open_spider(self,spider):
        self.f = open('duanzi.txt','w',encoding='utf-8')
    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        title = item['title']
        con = item['con']
        ## å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­ä»¶ä¸­
        self.f.write(f'{title}\n{con}\n')
        return item

    def close_spider(self,spider):
        self.f.close()

4-5 åŒæ—¶å†™å…¥åˆ° MySQL å’Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­

é¦–å…ˆåœ¨ setting ä¸­å¼€å¯ç®¡é“

ITEM_PIPELINES = {
    # å†™å…¥åˆ°MySQLæ•°æ®åº“ä¸­
   'duanzi03.pipelines.DuanziMYSQLPipeline': 300,
    # å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­
   'duanzi03.pipelines.DuanziFILEPipeline': 400,
}

ç„¶åå†™ä¸¤ä¸ªç®¡é“ï¼Œåˆ†åˆ«æŠŠæ•°æ®å­˜å‚¨åˆ°æ•°æ®åº“å’Œæ–‡ä»¶ä¸­

from itemadapter import ItemAdapter
import pymysql
# å†™å…¥åˆ°MySQLæ•°æ®åº“ä¹‹
class DuanziMYSQLPipeline:
    # å¼€å¯ä¸€æ¬¡
    def open_spider(self, spider):
        # print(spider.name)
        # è¿æ¥MySQLæ•°æ®åº“
        self.db = pymysql.connect(host='127.0.0.1', user='root', password='123456', db='duanzi')
        # è®¾ç½®å­—ç¬¦ç¼–ç 
        self.db.set_charset('utf8')
        # åˆ›å»ºæ¸¸æ ‡å¯¹è±¡
        self.cursor = self.db.cursor()

    # æ¯æ¬¡yieldçš„æ•°æ®è¿‡æ¥èµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        title = item['title']
        con = item['con']
        try:
            sql = f'insert into dz(title, con) values("{title}", "{con}")'
            self.cursor.execute(sql)  # æ‰§è¡ŒSQLè¯­å¥
            self.db.commit()  # äº‹åŠ¡æäº¤ å†™å…¥åˆ°MySQLæ•°æ®åº“ä¸­
        except Exception as e:
            print(sql, '===>', e)  # æ‰“å°é”™è¯¯å¼‚å¸¸ä¿¡æ¯
            self.db.rollback()  # äº‹åŠ¡å›æ»š
        # itemæ˜¯ä¼ é€’è¿‡æ¥çš„æ•°æ®
        return item

    # scrapyæ‰§è¡Œå®Œèµ°ä¸€æ¬¡
    def close_spider(self, spider):
        # å…³é—­æ•°æ®åº“è¿æ¥
        self.db.close()

# å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­
class DuanziFILEPipeline:
    def open_spider(self, spider):
        self.f = open('duanzi.txt', 'w', encoding='UTF-8')

    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        title = item['title']
        con = item['con']
        # å†™å…¥åˆ°æ–‡ä»¶ä¸­
        self.f.write(f'{title}\n{con}\n')
        return item   # returnä¸èƒ½å»æ‰ï¼ï¼ï¼

    def close_spider(self, spider):
        self.f.close()

4-6 ç®¡é“æ³¨æ„ç‚¹

æ€è€ƒï¼špipeline åœ¨ settings ä¸­èƒ½å¤Ÿå¼€å¯å¤šä¸ªï¼Œä¸ºä»€ä¹ˆéœ€è¦å¼€å¯å¤šä¸ªï¼Ÿ

4-6-1 pipeline ä½¿ç”¨æ³¨æ„ç‚¹

4-7-5 img.py çˆ¬è™«ä»£ç ä¹¦å†™

æ€è·¯ï¼š

æŠ“å–åˆ°è¯¦æƒ…é¡µä¸­å›¾ç‰‡çš„ url åœ°å€ï¼Œäº¤ç»™å›¾ç‰‡ç®¡é“è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½

import scrapy
from urllib.parse import urljoin


class ImgSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'img'
    # allowed_domains = ['desk.zol.com.cn/dongman']
    start_urls = ['http://desk.zol.com.cn/dongman/']

    def parse(self, resp, **kwargs):
        # å…ˆæŠ“å–åˆ°æ¯ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡è¯¦æƒ…çš„url
        url_list = resp.xpath('//ul[@class="pic-list2  clearfix"]/li/a/@href').extract()
        # è·å–åˆ°urlåˆ—è¡¨å è¿›è¡Œå¾ªç¯è¿›è¡Œæ¯ä¸€ä¸ªurlè¯¦æƒ…é¡µçš„è¯·æ±‚
        for url in url_list:
            # å› ä¸ºæŠ“å–åˆ°çš„urlå¹¶ä¸å®Œæ•´ï¼Œéœ€è¦è¿›è¡Œæ‰‹åŠ¨æ‹¼æ¥
            # urljoin('https://desk.zol.com.cn/dongman/', '/bizhi/8301_103027_2.html')
            url = urljoin('https://desk.zol.com.cn/dongman/', url)
            # æ‹¼å‡‘å®Œå‘ç°å½“å‰urlä¸­æœ‰ä¸‹è½½exeçš„urlï¼Œå°†å…¶å»é™¤
            if url.find('exe') != -1:
                continue
            yield scrapy.Request(url, callback=self.parse_detail)

    # å¯¹è¯¦æƒ…é¡µè¿›è¡Œè§£æ
    def parse_detail(self, resp):
        # è·å–å½“å‰è¯¦æƒ…é¡µä¸­æœ€å¤§å°ºå¯¸å›¾ç‰‡çš„url
        max_img_url = resp.xpath('//dd[@id="tagfbl"]/a/@href').extract()
        # åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰æœ€å¤§å›¾ç‰‡çš„urlåœ°å€ï¼Œä¸ºå€’æ•°ç¬¬äºŒä¸ªï¼Œå¦‚æœå½“å‰å›¾ç‰‡åˆ—è¡¨urlé•¿åº¦å°äº2 åˆ™å½“å‰è¯æ˜ä¸æ˜¯å›¾ç‰‡çš„url
        if len(max_img_url) > 2:
            max_img_url = urljoin('https://desk.zol.com.cn/', max_img_url[0])
            # å¯¹urlé¡µé¢è¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚ è·å–æœ€ç»ˆå¤§å›¾çš„é¡µé¢
            yield scrapy.Request(max_img_url, callback=self.parse_img_detail)

    def parse_img_detail(self, resp):
        # è§£æå‡ºå¤§å›¾çš„url
        img_src = resp.xpath("//img[1]/@src").extract_first()
        return {'img_src': img_src}

from scrapy.pipelines.images import ImagesPipeline
import scrapy

class Imgspipline(ImagesPipeline):
    # 1. å‘é€è¯·æ±‚(ä¸‹è½½å›¾ç‰‡, æ–‡ä»¶, è§†é¢‘,xxx)
    def get_media_requests(self, item, info):
          # è·å–åˆ°å›¾ç‰‡çš„url
        url = item['img_src']
        # è¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚
        yield scrapy.Request(url=url, meta={"url": url})  # ç›´æ¥è¿”å›ä¸€ä¸ªè¯·æ±‚å¯¹è±¡å³å¯

    # 2. å›¾ç‰‡å­˜å‚¨è·¯å¾„
    def file_path(self, request, response=None, info=None, *, item=None):
        # å½“å‰è·å–è¯·æ±‚çš„urlçš„æ–¹å¼æœ‰2ç§
        # è·å–åˆ°å½“å‰çš„url ç”¨äºå¤„ç†ä¸‹è½½å›¾ç‰‡çš„åç§°
        file_name = item['img_src'].split("/")[-1]  # ç”¨itemæ‹¿åˆ°url
        # file_name = request.meta['url'].split("/")[-1]  # ç”¨metaä¼ å‚è·å–
        return file_name

    # 3. å¯èƒ½éœ€è¦å¯¹itemè¿›è¡Œæ›´æ–°
    def item_completed(self, results, item, info):
        # print('results', results)
        for r in results:
            # è·å–æ¯ä¸ªå›¾ç‰‡çš„è·¯å¾„
            print(r[1]['path'])
        return item  # ä¸€å®šè¦return item æŠŠæ•°æ®ä¼ é€’ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªç®¡é“

scrapy ä¸­ start_url æ˜¯é€šè¿‡ start_requests æ¥è¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†çš„ï¼Œå…¶å®ç°ä»£ç å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼Œè¿™æ ·çš„è¯ setting ä¸­çš„ COOKIES_ENABLED = True ä¸ç”¨å…³äº†ã€‚

def start_requests(self):
    cls = self.__class__
    if method_is_overridden(cls, Spider, 'make_requests_from_url'):
        warnings.warn(
            "Spider.make_requests_from_url method is deprecated; it "
            "won't be called in future Scrapy releases. Please "
            "override Spider.start_requests method instead (see %s.%s)." % (
                cls.__module__, cls.__name__
            ),
        )
        for url in self.start_urls:
            yield self.make_requests_from_url(url)
    else:
        for url in self.start_urls:
            yield Request(url, dont_filter=True)

æ‰€ä»¥å¯¹åº”çš„ï¼Œå¦‚æœ start_url åœ°å€ä¸­çš„ url æ˜¯éœ€è¦ç™»å½•åæ‰èƒ½è®¿é—®çš„ url åœ°å€ï¼Œåˆ™éœ€è¦é‡å†™ start_request æ–¹æ³•å¹¶åœ¨å…¶ä¸­æ‰‹åŠ¨æ·»åŠ ä¸Š cookie

    def parse(self, response):

4-4-4 scrapy.FormRequest å‘é€ post è¯·æ±‚

# æˆ‘ä»¬çŸ¥é“å¯ä»¥é€šè¿‡scrapy.Request()æŒ‡å®šmethodã€bodyå‚æ•°æ¥å‘é€postè¯·æ±‚ï¼›é‚£ä¹ˆä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥ä½¿ç”¨scrapy.FormRequest()æ¥å‘é€postè¯·æ±‚
4-1 scrapy.FormRequest()çš„ä½¿ç”¨

é€šè¿‡ scrapy.FormRequest èƒ½å¤Ÿå‘é€ post è¯·æ±‚ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶éœ€è¦æ·»åŠ  fromdata å‚æ•°ä½œä¸ºè¯·æ±‚ä½“ï¼Œä»¥åŠ callback

import scrapy

class DlSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'dl'
    allowed_domains = ['17k.com']
    start_urls = ['https://user.17k.com/ck/user/myInfo/96139098?bindInfo=1&appKey=2406394919']

    def start_requests(self):
        # ç™»å½•çš„urlåœ°å€
        login_url = 'https://passport.17k.com/ck/user/login'
        data = {
            'loginName': '17346570232',
            'password': 'xlg17346570232'
        }
        # data = 'loginName=17346570232&password=xlg17346570232'
        # yield scrapy.Request(login_url, body=data, method='POST', callback=self.parse_do_login)
        yield scrapy.FormRequest(login_url, formdata=data, callback=self.parse_do_login)

    def parse_do_login(self, response, **kwargs):
        # å½“å‰å¯¹äºstart_urlsä¸­çš„åœ°å€è¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚
        yield scrapy.Request(self.start_urls[0])

    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        print(response.text)
4-2 ä½¿ç”¨ scrapy.FormRequest()ç™»é™†
4-2-1 æ€è·¯åˆ†æ
1. æ‰¾åˆ°postçš„urlåœ°å€ï¼šç‚¹å‡»ç™»å½•æŒ‰é’®è¿›è¡ŒæŠ“åŒ…ï¼Œç„¶åå®šä½urlåœ°å€ä¸ºhttps://user.17k.com/ck/user/mine/readList?page=1&appKey=2406394919
2. æ‰¾åˆ°è¯·æ±‚ä½“çš„è§„å¾‹ï¼šåˆ†æpostè¯·æ±‚çš„è¯·æ±‚ä½“ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­åŒ…å«çš„å‚æ•°å‡åœ¨å‰ä¸€æ¬¡çš„å“åº”ä¸­
3. å¦ç™»å½•æˆåŠŸï¼šé€šè¿‡è¯·æ±‚ä¸ªäººä¸»é¡µï¼Œè§‚å¯Ÿæ˜¯å¦åŒ…å«ç”¨æˆ·å
4-2-2 ä»£ç å®ç°å¦‚ä¸‹ï¼š
import scrapy


class DengluSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'denglu'
    # allowed_domains = ['17k.com']
    start_urls = ['https://user.17k.com/ck/user/mine/readList?page=1&appKey=2406394919']

    def start_requests(self):
        '''
        è¯·æ±‚ç™»é™†çš„è´¦å·å’Œå¯†ç 
        '''
        login_url = 'https://passport.17k.com/ck/user/login'
        # ä½¿ç”¨requestè¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚
        # yield scrapy.Request(url=login_url, body='loginName=17346570232&password=xlg17346570232', callback=self.do_login, method='POST')
        # ä½¿ç”¨Requestå­ç±»FormRequestè¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚  è‡ªåŠ¨ä¸ºpostè¯·æ±‚
        yield scrapy.FormRequest(
            url=login_url,
            formdata={'loginName': '17346570232', 'password': 'xlg17346570232'},
            callback=self.do_login
        )

    def do_login(self, response):
        '''
        ç™»é™†æˆåŠŸåè°ƒç”¨parseè¿›è¡Œå¤„ç†
        cookieä¸­é—´ä»¶ä¼šå¸®æˆ‘ä»¬è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†æºå¸¦cookie
        '''
        for url in self.start_urls:
            yield scrapy.Request(url=url, callback=self.parse)

    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        print(response.text)
4-4-3ã€å°æŠ€å·§

def base64_api(uname, pwd, img, typeid):
    with open(img, 'rb') as f:
        base64_data = base64.b64encode(f.read())
        b64 = base64_data.decode()
    data = {"username": uname, "password": pwd, "typeid": typeid, "image": b64}
    result = json.loads(requests.post("http://api.ttshitu.com/predict", json=data).text)
    if result['success']:
        return result["data"]["result"]
    else:
        #ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿”å› äººå·¥ä¸è¶³ç­‰ é”™è¯¯æƒ…å†µ è¯·åŠ é€»è¾‘å¤„ç†é˜²æ­¢è„šæœ¬å¡æ­» ç»§ç»­é‡æ–° è¯†åˆ«
        return result["message"]
    return ""


if __name__ == "__main__":
    img_path = "yzm.jpg"
    # éªŒè¯ç åœ°å€
    yzm_url = 'https://so.gushiwen.cn/RandCode.ashx'
    session = requests.Session()
    img_res = session.get(yzm_url)
    # éªŒè¯ç å­˜å…¥æœ¬åœ°
    with open(img_path, 'wb') as f:
        f.write(img_res.content)
    # è¯†åˆ«éªŒè¯ç 
    result = base64_api(uname='luckyboyxlg', pwd='17346570232', img=img_path, typeid=3)
    print(result)
    # éªŒè¯ç æ‰”è¿›è¡¨å•
    data['code'] = result
    # è¯·æ±‚ç™»å½•æ¥å£
    res = session.post(url, headers=headers, data=data)
    with open('gsw.html', 'w', encoding='UTF-8') as f:
        f.write(res.content.decode())
5-2 scrapy å¤„ç†éªŒè¯ç 
import scrapy
import json
import base64
import requests

class DlSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'dl'
    # allowed_domains = ['dl.com']
    start_urls = ['https://so.gushiwen.cn/RandCode.ashx']

    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        img_path = "yzm.jpg"
        with open(img_path, 'wb') as f:
            f.write(response.body)
        # è¯†åˆ«éªŒè¯ç 
        result = self.base64_api(uname='luckyboyxlg', pwd='17346570232', img=img_path, typeid=3)
        print(result)
        data = {
            '__VIEWSTATE': 'mz408EoRxmRm5lSHqJ2RgFvDmJqOk/mNy0oQveKPJPdj0PQK8DemwQgoq6A8jEwXORmftrgcWnfuSWI1oRJrgp6x5kl+ouo08OG//6RLDTfZF2Zgi6K9midMNOik8R5upVE3d0PXol3YVxWLqkfOYpZRLHk=',
            '__VIEWSTATEGENERATOR': 'C93BE1AE',
            'from': 'http://so.gushiwen.cn/user/collect.aspx',
            'email': '793390457@qq.com',
            'pwd': 'xlg17346570232',
            'code': result,
            'denglu': 'ç™»å½•'
        }
        # è¯·æ±‚ç™»å½•æ¥å£
        url = 'https://so.gushiwen.cn/user/login.aspx?from=http%3a%2f%2fso.gushiwen.cn%2fuser%2fcollect.aspx'
        yield scrapy.FormRequest(url, formdata=data, callback=self.parse_login)

    def parse_login(self, response):
        with open('gsw.html', 'w', encoding='UTF-8') as f:
            f.write(response.text)

    def base64_api(self, uname, pwd, img, typeid):
        with open(img, 'rb') as f:
            base64_data = base64.b64encode(f.read())
            b64 = base64_data.decode()
        data = {"username": uname, "password": pwd, "typeid": typeid, "image": b64}
        result = json.loads(requests.post("http://api.ttshitu.com/predict", json=data).text)
        if result['success']:
            return result["data"]["result"]
        else:
            #ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼æ³¨æ„ï¼šè¿”å› äººå·¥ä¸è¶³ç­‰ é”™è¯¯æƒ…å†µ è¯·åŠ é€»è¾‘å¤„ç†é˜²æ­¢è„šæœ¬å¡æ­» ç»§ç»­é‡æ–° è¯†åˆ«
            return result["message"]
        return ""

}

    book_name = a.xpath('./text()')[0]
    print(href, book_name)

5-1-4 æœ€ç»ˆç‰ˆæœ¬
import os.path
import time
from urllib.parse import urljoin
import requests
from lxml import etree
import random

def get_data(url):
    '''
    å¯¹urlå‘èµ·è¯·æ±‚  è¿”å›treeå¯¹è±¡
    :param url: è¯·æ±‚çš„urlåœ°å€
    :return: treeå¯¹è±¡
    '''
    headers = {
        'User-Agent': 'Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/119.0.0.0 Safari/537.36',
    }
    response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
    con = response.content.decode()
    tree = etree.HTML(con)
    return tree


def get_book(tree):
    '''
    è·å–ä¹¦çš„åç§°å’Œurlåœ°å€
    :param tree: å½“å‰å†…å®¹çš„treeå¯¹è±¡
    :return: ä¹¦åå’Œurlçš„å­—å…¸ {'ä¸‰å›½æ¼”ä¹‰': â€˜http://www......â€™}
    '''
    book_list = tree.xpath('//div[@class="book-item"]/h3/a')
    book_href_name = {}
    for a in book_list:
        href = urljoin('https://www.shicimingju.com/', a.xpath('./@href')[0])
        book_name = a.xpath('./text()')[0]
        # print(href, book_name)
        book_href_name[book_name] = href
    return book_href_name


def get_mulu(tree):
    '''
    è·å–ä¹¦ç« èŠ‚çš„urlå’Œåç§°
    :param tree: è¯·æ±‚ç« èŠ‚å†…å®¹è¿”å›çš„treeå¯¹è±¡
    :return: dict {'ç¬¬ä¸€ç« ': 'http://www....'}
    '''
    mulu_list = tree.xpath('//div[@class="book-mulu"]/ul/li/a')
    mulu_href_name = {}
    for mulu in mulu_list:
        # æ‹¼æ¥å®Œæ•´çš„ç« èŠ‚url
        mulu_url = urljoin('https://www.shicimingju.com/', mulu.xpath('./@href')[0])
        # è·å–ç« èŠ‚åç§°
        mulu_name = mulu.xpath('./text()')[0]
        # print(mulu_url, mulu_name)
        mulu_href_name[mulu_name] = mulu_url
    return mulu_href_name


def get_content(book_name, mulu_name, tree):
    '''
    å°†ç« èŠ‚å†…å®¹å†™å…¥åˆ°æœ¬åœ°
    :param book_name: ä¹¦çš„åç§°
    :param mulu_name:  ç« èŠ‚åç§°
    :param tree: treeå¯¹è±¡
    :return: None
    '''
    # å¦‚æœå½“å‰ä¹¦çš„ç›®å½•ä¸å­˜åœ¨ åˆ™åˆ›å»º
    if not os.path.exists(book_name):
        os.mkdir(book_name)
    # æŠ“å–ç« èŠ‚çš„å†…å®¹
    con = ''.join(tree.xpath('//div[@class="card bookmark-list"]//text()'))
    # print(con)
    with open(os.path.join(book_name, mulu_name+'.txt'), 'w', encoding='UTF-8') as f:
        f.write(con)
    print(book_name, mulu_name, 'ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆ')


if __name__ == '__main__':
    url = 'https://www.shicimingju.com/bookmark/sidamingzhu.html'
    # è·å–ä¹¦çš„urlå’Œä¹¦çš„åç§°
    for book_name, book_url in get_book(get_data(url)).items():
        # å¾ªç¯è·å–ç« èŠ‚å’Œç« èŠ‚url
        for mulu_name, mulu_url in get_mulu(get_data(book_url)).items():
            # è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
            get_content(book_name, mulu_name, get_data(mulu_url))
            time.sleep(random.randint(1,3))

4-5-2 scrapy.Request çš„æ›´å¤šå‚æ•°

scrapy.Request(url[,callback,method="GET",headers,body,cookies, meta,dont_filter=False])

å‚æ•°è§£é‡Š

1. ä¸­æ‹¬å·ä¸­çš„å‚æ•°ä¸ºå¯é€‰å‚æ•°
2. callbackï¼š## è¡¨ç¤ºå½“å‰çš„urlçš„å“åº”äº¤ç»™å“ªä¸ªå‡½æ•°å»å¤„ç†
3. metaï¼š## å®ç°æ•°æ®åœ¨ä¸åŒçš„è§£æå‡½æ•°ä¸­ä¼ é€’ï¼Œmetaé»˜è®¤å¸¦æœ‰éƒ¨åˆ†æ•°æ®ï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚ä¸‹è½½å»¶è¿Ÿï¼Œè¯·æ±‚æ·±åº¦ç­‰
4. dont_filter:## é»˜è®¤ä¸ºFalseï¼Œä¼šè¿‡æ»¤è¯·æ±‚çš„urlåœ°å€ï¼Œå³è¯·æ±‚è¿‡çš„urlåœ°å€ä¸ä¼šç»§ç»­è¢«è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå¯¹éœ€è¦é‡å¤è¯·æ±‚çš„urlåœ°å€å¯ä»¥æŠŠå®ƒè®¾ç½®ä¸ºTureï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚è´´å§çš„ç¿»é¡µè¯·æ±‚ï¼Œé¡µé¢çš„æ•°æ®æ€»æ˜¯åœ¨å˜åŒ–;start_urlsä¸­çš„åœ°å€ä¼šè¢«åå¤è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå¦åˆ™ç¨‹åºä¸ä¼šå¯åŠ¨
5. methodï¼š## æŒ‡å®šPOSTæˆ–GETè¯·æ±‚
6. headersï¼š## æ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä¸ªå­—å…¸ï¼Œå…¶ä¸­ä¸åŒ…æ‹¬cookies
7. cookiesï¼š## æ¥æ”¶ä¸€ä¸ªå­—å…¸ï¼Œä¸“é—¨æ”¾ç½®cookies
8. bodyï¼š ## ä¼ é€’æ•°æ®  å­—ç¬¦ä¸²æ ¼å¼   ä¸ºPOSTçš„æ•°æ®

4-5-3 meta å‚æ•°çš„ä½œç”¨

meta çš„å½¢å¼:å­—å…¸

meta çš„ä½œç”¨ï¼šmeta å¯ä»¥å®ç°æ•°æ®åœ¨ä¸åŒçš„è§£æå‡½æ•°ä¸­çš„ä¼ é€’

åœ¨çˆ¬è™«æ–‡ä»¶çš„ parse æ–¹æ³•ä¸­ï¼Œæå–è¯¦æƒ…é¡µå¢åŠ ä¹‹å‰ callback æŒ‡å®šçš„ parse_detail å‡½æ•°ï¼š

def parse(self,response):
    ...
    yield scrapy.Request(detail_url, callback=self.parse_detail,meta={"item":item})
...

def parse_detail(self,response):
    #è·å–ä¹‹å‰ä¼ å…¥çš„item
    item = resposne.meta["item"]

ç‰¹åˆ«æ³¨æ„

  1. meta å‚æ•°æ˜¯ä¸€ä¸ªå­—å…¸
  2. meta å­—å…¸ä¸­æœ‰ä¸€ä¸ªå›ºå®šçš„é”®proxyï¼Œè¡¨ç¤ºä»£ç† ipï¼Œå…³äºä»£ç† ip çš„ä½¿ç”¨æˆ‘ä»¬å°†åœ¨ scrapy çš„ä¸‹è½½ä¸­é—´ä»¶çš„å­¦ä¹ ä¸­è¿›è¡Œä»‹ç»

4-5-4 scrapy æŠ“å–å››å¤§åè‘—

çˆ¬è™«çš„ä»£ç 

import scrapy


class SdmzSpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'sdmz'
    # allowed_domains = ['www.com']
    start_urls = ['https://www.shicimingju.com/bookmark/sidamingzhu.html']

    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        # è·å–å››å¤§åè‘—çš„ä¹¦åå’Œurl
        a_list = response.xpath('//div[@class="book-item"]/h3/a')
        for a in a_list:
            book_url = response.urljoin(a.xpath('./@href').extract_first())
            book_name = a.xpath('./text()').extract_first()
            # print(book_url, book_name)
            # ä¼ é€’ä¹¦ç»™ä¸‹ä¸€ä¸ªæ–¹æ³• ç”¨äºæœ€ç»ˆåˆ›å»ºä¹¦å­˜å‚¨çš„è·¯å¾„
            yield scrapy.Request(book_url, callback=self.parse_mulu, meta={'book_name': book_name})

    # å¤„ç†ä¹¦çš„ç« èŠ‚çš„
    def parse_mulu(self, response, **kwargs):
        book_name = response.meta['book_name']
        # è·å–ä¹¦çš„ç« èŠ‚å’Œurl
        a_list = response.xpath('//div[@class="book-mulu"]/ul/li/a')
        for a in a_list:
            mulu_url = response.urljoin(a.xpath('./@href').extract_first())
            mulu_name = a.xpath('./text()').extract_first()
            # å¯¹ç« èŠ‚urlè¿›è¡Œè¯·æ±‚ å¹¶æºå¸¦å½“å‰ä¹¦å ç« èŠ‚åç§° æ–¹ä¾¿åç»­åˆ›å»ºå­˜å‚¨ç›®å½•
            yield scrapy.Request(mulu_url, callback=self.parse_content, meta={'book_name': book_name, 'mulu_name': mulu_name})

    # è§£æç« èŠ‚çš„å†…å®¹
    def parse_content(self, response, **kwargs):
        # è·å–ä¹¦åï¼Œ ç« èŠ‚åç§°ï¼Œç›®çš„ä¸ºäº†ç®¡é“ä¸­è¿›è¡Œç›®å½•å±‚çº§çš„åˆ›å»º
        book_name = response.meta['book_name']
        mulu_name = response.meta['mulu_name']
        contnet = ''.join(response.xpath('//div[@class="card bookmark-list"]//text()').extract())
        # å°†ä¹¦åï¼Œç« èŠ‚åï¼Œç« èŠ‚çš„å†…å®¹ä¼ é€’åˆ°ç®¡é“ è¿›è¡Œä¸‹è½½
        yield {'book_name': book_name, 'mulu_name': mulu_name, 'contnet': contnet}
        # print({'book_name': book_name, 'mulu_name': mulu_name, 'contnet': contnet})

ç®¡é“çš„ä»£ç 

# Define your item pipelines here
#
# Don't forget to add your pipeline to the ITEM_PIPELINES setting
# See: https://docs.scrapy.org/en/latest/topics/item-pipeline.html


# useful for handling different item types with a single interface
from itemadapter import ItemAdapter
import os

class SidamingzhuPipeline:
    def process_item(self, item, spider):
        # ä¹¦å
        book_name = item['book_name']
        # ç« èŠ‚åç§°
        mulu_name = item['mulu_name']
        # ç« èŠ‚å†…å®¹
        contnet = item['contnet']
        # åˆ¤æ–­å½“å‰ä¹¦çš„ç›®å½•æ˜¯å¦å­˜åœ¨
        # if not os.path.exists(book_name):
        #     os.mkdir(book_name)
        total = 'å››å¤§åè‘—'
        # åŠ ä¸€ä¸ªæ€»ç›®å½•
        """
        å››å¤§åè‘—
            æ°´æµ’
            ä¸‰å›½
            ...
        """
        dir = os.path.join(total, book_name)
        if not os.path.exists(dir):
            os.makedirs(dir)  # é€’å½’åˆ›å»º
        # æ‹¼æ¥è·¯å¾„ ä¹¦çš„è·¯å¾„
        path = os.path.join(dir, mulu_name+'.txt')
        # å†™å…¥åˆ°æœ¬åœ°
        with open(path, 'w', encoding='UTF-8') as f:
            f.write(contnet)
        print(book_name, mulu_name, 'ä¸‹è½½å®Œæˆ')

4-5-5 item.py çš„ä½œç”¨

6-1 crawlspider æ˜¯ä»€ä¹ˆ

æ€è·¯ï¼š

  1. ä» response ä¸­æå–æ‰€æœ‰çš„æ»¡è¶³è§„åˆ™çš„ url åœ°å€
  2. è‡ªåŠ¨çš„æ„é€ è‡ªå·± requests è¯·æ±‚ï¼Œå‘é€ç»™å¼•æ“

å¯¹åº”çš„crawlspider å°±å¯ä»¥å®ç°ä¸Šè¿°éœ€æ±‚ï¼Œèƒ½å¤ŸåŒ¹é…æ»¡è¶³æ¡ä»¶çš„ url åœ°å€ï¼Œç»„è£…æˆ Reuqest å¯¹è±¡åè‡ªåŠ¨å‘é€ç»™å¼•æ“ï¼ŒåŒæ—¶èƒ½å¤ŸæŒ‡å®š callback å‡½æ•°

å³ï¼šcrawlspider çˆ¬è™«å¯ä»¥æŒ‰ç…§è§„åˆ™è‡ªåŠ¨è·å–è¿æ¥

è¿›è¡Œ settings.py é…ç½®

6-3 Rules è§„åˆ™

import scrapy
from scrapy.linkextractors import LinkExtractor
from scrapy.spiders import CrawlSpider, Rule

## ç»§æ‰¿çš„æ˜¯CrawISpider
class DzSpider(CrawlSpider):
    name = 'dz'
    # allowed_domains = ['dz.com']
    start_urls = ['https://duanzixing.com/']
    # è§„åˆ™
    '''
    https://duanzixing.com/page/2/
    https://duanzixing.com/page/3/
    '''
    rules = (
        # å‚æ•°ä¸€ é“¾æ¥æå–å™¨ å¿…é¡»çš„ï¼ˆç»™å®šä¸€ä¸ªè§„åˆ™  ä»–èˆ…ä¼šæŒ‰ç…§è¿™ä¸ªè§„åˆ™è¿›è¡Œurlçš„åŒ¹é…å¹¶è¯·æ±‚ï¼‰é»˜è®¤ä½¿ç”¨çš„æ˜¯æ­£åˆ™ï¼ï¼ï¼
        # å‚æ•°äºŒ å›è°ƒ è¯·æ±‚åçš„å“åº”äº¤ç»™è° è·Ÿä¹‹å‰çš„åŒºåˆ«æ˜¯ æ²¡æœ‰self
        # å‚æ•°ä¸‰  æ˜¯å¦è¿›å…¥å†æ¬¡åŒ¹é…  å¦‚æœä¸æƒ³æ”¹ä¸ºFalse

        # Rule(LinkExtractor(allow=r'page/\d+/'), callback='parse_item', follow=False),
        # Rule(LinkExtractor(allow=r'page/\d+/'), callback='parse_item', follow=True),
        # Rule(LinkExtractor(allow=r'https://duanzixing\.com/page/\d+/'), callback='parse_item', follow=False),
        # æŠ“å–æ‰€æœ‰è¶…é“¾æ¥
        # Rule(LinkExtractor(allow=r''), callback='parse_item', follow=False),
        # ä½¿ç”¨æ­£åˆ™è¿›è¡ŒåŒ¹é…
        Rule(LinkExtractor(restrict_xpaths='/html/body/section/div/div/div[2]/ul/li/a'), callback='parse_item', follow=False),

    )

    def parse_item(self, response):
        item = {}
        print(response.url)
        # print(response.url)
        # response.xpath('//article[@class="excerpt"]/header/a/text()').extract()
        # response.xpath('//article[@class="excerpt"]/p[@class="note"]/text()').extract()

        return item

settings.py(å¼€å¯ä¸­é—´ä»¶)

middlewares.py

from scrapy import signals


# å¯¼å…¥éšæœºua
from zhongjianjian01.settings import USER_AGENTS_LIST
import random

class Zhongjianjian01DownloaderMiddleware:
    # Not all methods need to be defined. If a method is not defined,
    # scrapy acts as if the downloader middleware does not modify the
    # passed objects.

    @classmethod
    def from_crawler(cls, crawler):
        # This method is used by Scrapy to create your spiders.
        s = cls()
        crawler.signals.connect(s.spider_opened, signal=signals.spider_opened)
        return s

    def process_request(self, request, spider):
        # éšæœºua
        ua = random.choice(USER_AGENTS_LIST)
        request.headers['User-Agent'] = ua
        print(request.headers['User-Agent'])
        print('process_request')
        return None

    def process_response(self, request, response, spider):
        print('process_response')
        return response

    def process_exception(self, request, exception, spider):
        print('process_exception', exception)

    def spider_opened(self, spider):
        spider.logger.info('Spider opened: %s' % spider.name)

import random
from Tencent.settings import USER_AGENTS_LIST # æ³¨æ„å¯¼å…¥è·¯å¾„,è¯·å¿½è§†pycharmçš„é”™è¯¯æç¤º

class UserAgentMiddleware(object):
    def process_request(self, request, spider):
        user_agent = random.choice(USER_AGENTS_LIST)
        request.headers['User-Agent'] = user_agent

class ProxyMiddleware(object):
    def process_request(self,request,spider):
        proxy = random.choice(proxies) # proxieså¯ä»¥åœ¨settings.pyä¸­ï¼Œä¹Ÿå¯ä»¥æ¥æºäºä»£ç†ipçš„webapi
        # proxy = 'http://192.168.1.1:8118'

        return None # å¯ä»¥ä¸å†™return

5-5-3 æ£€æµ‹ä»£ç† ip æ˜¯å¦å¯ç”¨

åœ¨ä½¿ç”¨äº†ä»£ç† ip çš„æƒ…å†µä¸‹å¯ä»¥åœ¨ä¸‹è½½ä¸­é—´ä»¶çš„ process_response()æ–¹æ³•ä¸­å¤„ç†ä»£ç† ip çš„ä½¿ç”¨æƒ…å†µï¼Œå¦‚æœè¯¥ä»£ç† ip ä¸èƒ½ä½¿ç”¨å¯ä»¥æ›¿æ¢å…¶ä»–ä»£ç† ip

class ProxyMiddleware(object):
    def process_response(self, request, response, spider):
        if response.status != '200' and response.status != '302':
            #æ­¤æ—¶å¯¹ä»£ç†ipè¿›è¡Œæ“ä½œï¼Œæ¯”å¦‚åˆ é™¤
            return request

çˆ¬è™«ä»£ç  wy.py

import scrapy
from selenium.webdriver import Chrome
from selenium.webdriver.chrome.options import Options

# ä¸€å®šé‡æ–°ä¸‹è½½è°·æ­Œé©±åŠ¨ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼ï¼

class WySpider(scrapy.Spider):
    name = 'wy'

    opt = Options()
    opt.add_argument("--headless")
    # opt.add_argument('--disable-gpu')
    # å®ä¾‹åŒ–seleniumå¯¹è±¡
    web = Chrome(options=opt)


    # allowed_domains = ['news.163.com/domestic/']
    start_urls = ['https://news.163.com/']
    li_index = [1, 2]
    url_list = []  # å­˜æ”¾å›½å†…å’Œå›½é™…çš„url
    def parse(self, response, **kwargs):
        # æŠ“å–æˆ‘ä»¬è¦è®¿é—®çš„url  å›½å†… å›½é™…
        menu_list = response.xpath('//div[@class="ns_area list"]/ul/li/a/@href').extract()
        for i in range(len(menu_list)):
            if i in self.li_index:
                url = menu_list[i]  # å–å‡ºå›½å†…  å›½é™…çš„url
                self.url_list.append(url)
                yield scrapy.Request(url, callback=self.parse_page)

    # è§£æå›½å†…ï¼Œå›½é™…é¡µé¢çš„æ•°æ®
    def parse_page(self, response, **kwargs):
        # è§£ææ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…çš„url
        page_detail_url = response.xpath('//div[@class="ndi_main"]/div/a/@href').extract()
        for url in page_detail_url:
            yield scrapy.Request(url, callback=self.parse_page_detail)

    # è§£ææ–°é—»è¯¦æƒ…
    def parse_page_detail(self, response, **kwargs):
        title = response.xpath('//h1[@class="post_title"]/text()').extract_first()
        # æ–°é—»å†…å®¹
        con = ''.join(response.xpath('//div[@class="post_main"]//text()').extract())
        data = {'title': title, 'con': con}
        print(data)
        yield data

Middlewares.py

import time
from scrapy import signals
from itemadapter import is_item, ItemAdapter
from scrapy.http import HtmlResponse

rom wangyi.settings import USER_AGENTS_LIST
import random
class WangyiDownloaderMiddleware:
    # Not all methods need to be defined. If a method is not defined,
    # scrapy acts as if the downloader middleware does not modify the
    # passed objects.

    @classmethod
    def from_crawler(cls, crawler):
        # This method is used by Scrapy to create your spiders.
        s = cls()
        crawler.signals.connect(s.spider_opened, signal=signals.spider_opened)
        return s

    def process_request(self, request, spider):
        ua = random.choice(USER_AGENTS_LIST)
        request.headers['User-Agent'] = ua
        return None

    def process_response(self, request, response, spider):
        driver = spider.web   # æ‹¿åˆ°seleniumå¯¹è±¡
        url = request.url
        if url in spider.url_list:
            driver.get(url)  # å¼€å§‹è®¿é—®çš„url
            # æ»šåŠ¨æ¡æ»šåŠ¨åˆ°åº•éƒ¨
            driver.execute_script('window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight)')
            time.sleep(random.randint(1, 3))
            driver.execute_script('window.scrollTo(0, document.body.scrollHeight)')
            time.sleep(random.randint(1, 3))
            source = driver.page_source  # è·å–é¡µé¢æºä»£ç 
            #  ç¯¡æ”¹å“åº”
            return HtmlResponse(url=url, body=source, encoding='UTF-8', request=request)
        return response

    def process_exception(self, request, exception, spider):
        # Called when a download handler or a process_request()
        # (from other downloader middleware) raises an exception.

        # Must either:
        # - return None: continue processing this exception
        # - return a Response object: stops process_exception() chain
        # - return a Request object: stops process_exception() chain
        pass

    def spider_opened(self, spider):
        spider.logger.info('Spider opened: %s' % spider.name)

class FbsSpider(RedisCrawlSpider):

    # allowed_domains = ['www.xxx.com']
    # start_urls = ['http://www.xxx.com/']

    å®ç°æ–¹å¼å°±æ˜¯ä¹‹å‰çš„crawlspiderç±»å‹çš„çˆ¬è™«

    import scrapy
from scrapy.linkextractors import LinkExtractor
from scrapy.spiders import CrawlSpider, Rule
from scrapy_redis.spiders import RedisCrawlSpider

# æ³¨æ„  ä¸€å®šè¦ç»§æ‰¿RedisCrawlSpider
class FbsSpider(RedisCrawlSpider):
    name = 'fbs'
    # allowed_domains = ['www.xxx.com']
    # start_urls = ['http://www.xxx.com/']
    redis_key = 'fbsQueue'  # ä½¿ç”¨ç®¡é“åç§°
    link = LinkExtractor(allow=r'/political/politics/index?id=\d+')
    rules = (
        Rule(link, callback='parse_item', follow=True),
    )

    def parse_item(self, response):
        item = {}
        yield item
